K06D0032_H0033:284a-10: lo ma'i khang pa la longs spyod pan skyon brgyad po ni /
K06D0032_H0033:284a-11: shing mang po la nor mang po dgos pa dang
K06D0032_H0033:284a-12: bsdus nas khang pa byed cing tshol ba ni skyon
K06D0032_H0033:284a-16: yang zad pas na bcos dgos pa rgyun mi 'chad pa ni skyon gnyis pa dang /
K06D0032_H0033:284a-17: nyal ba'i gnas zhes bya ba na chen po la rigs te /
K06D0032_H0033:284a-18: dus ma yin par slong dgos pas sems gcig tu mi gnas pa dang /
K06D0032_H0033:284a-19: 'gro dgos pa ni skyon gsum pa dang /
K06D0032_H0033:284a-23: lus bde bar byed pa ni skyon bzhi pa dang /
K06D0032_H0033:284a-24: khang ba'i nang du zhugs nas sdig pa byed par nus pa dang /
K06D0032_H0033:284a-25: ngo tsha ba bzlog pa ni skyon lnga pa dang /
K06D0032_H0033:284a-26: bdag gi yin no zhes srung ba ni skyon drug pa dang /
K06D0032_H0033:284b-1: khyim pa yod ces pa gnyis par skyon bdun pa dang /
K06D0032_H0033:284b-4: khyi shig la sogs pa'i srog chags du ma gnas par 'gyur ba ni skyon brgyad pa'o //
K06D0032_H0033:284b-5: 'di rnams kyi skyon brgyad po rnams mthong nas sems dpa' chen pos lo ma'i khang pa spangs so //
K06D0032_H0033:284b-7: skyon brgyad dang ni ldan pa yi //
K06D0032_H0033:284b-8: lo ma'i khang pa spangs zhes pa //
K06D0032_H0033:284b-9: shing gi drung du gnas gyur na //
K06D0032_H0033:284b-10: yon tan bcu dang ldan pa yin //
K06D0032_H0033:284b-11: yib ba'i gnas rnams spangs pa dang //
K06D0032_H0033:284b-12: yon tan bcu dang ldan pa yi //
K06D0032_H0033:284b-13: shing gi drung du gnas pa'o //
K06D0032_H0033:284b-14: zhes brjod pa ni de la yon tan bcu po
K06D0032_H0033:284b-15: 'di bsag mi dgos pa ni yon tan gcig dang
K06D0032_H0033:284b-16: / nyal bar gnas pa tsam gyis bsrung mi dgos par rnyed pa ni gnyis pa dang /
K06D0032_H0033:284b-17: der byi dor byed pa med par longs spyod pa dang /
K06D0032_H0033:284b-19: slong ba med pa ni gsum pa dang /
K06D0032_H0033:284b-20: ngo tsha ba ni yib pa med cing der sdig
K06D0032_H0033:284b-21: pa byed pa med la sbed pa med pa ni
K06D0032_H0033:284b-22: bzhi pa dang / bla khab med pa'i gnas bzhin
K06D0032_H0033:284b-23: du lus rtag tu sdod pa med pa ni lnga
K06D0032_H0033:284b-24: bzhi pa dang / pa dang / yongs su 'dzin par mi 'dod pa ni drug pa dang /
K06D0032_H0033:284b-25: khyim gyi? 'dod pa spangs pa ni bdun pa dang /
K06D0032_H0033:284b-26: mang po dogs pa'i 'dzin pa med pa dang /
K06D0032_H0033:284b-27: yongs su bsrung ba med pa dang /
K06D0032_H0033:284b-28: 'gro ba na 'dod pa med pa ni brgyad pa dang /
K06D0032_H0033:285a-1: na dga' ba dang bcas pa med pa ni dgu ba dang /
K06D0032_H0033:285a-2: shing drung gi gnas ni song zhing song ba na rnyed sla ba dang /
K06D0032_H0033:285a-3: ltos pa med pa ni bcu pa'o //
K06D0032_H0033:285a-4: yon tan bcu po 'di mthong ste /
K06D0032_H0033:285a-5: shing gi 'gram du gnas zhes brjod pa dang /
K06D0032_H0033:285a-6: 'di lta bu de rnams ni byed par bsams pa'o //
K06D0032_H0033:285a-7: sems dpa' chen po sang gi nyi ma la bsod
K06D0032_H0033:285a-8: snyoms la gshegs pas de ma thag tu grong du
K06D0032_H0033:285a-9: sleb ste mi rnams spro ba chen po skyes nas
K06D0032_H0033:285a-11: de'i gdugs tshod thon nas gnas su byon te sleb cing bzhugs nas bsams pa /
K06D0032_H0033:285a-12: bdag gis bsod snyoms thob pa'i phyir rab tu byung ba ni ma yin no //
K06D0032_H0033:285a-13: zas zhim po zhes bya ba 'dis nga rgyal gyis rgyags pa dang /
K06D0032_H0033:285a-14: skyes bu 'dod pa'i rgyags pa 'phel ba dang /
K06D0032_H0033:285a-15: bza' ba'i gzhi la brten nas sdug bsngal mtha' med do //
K06D0032_H0033:285a-16: bdag gis slar yang btab pa dang bskrun pa las skyes pa'i 'bru'i bza' ba spangs nas /
K06D0032_H0033:285a-17: 'bras bu mchog gi bza' ba la brten par bya'o //
K06D0032_H0033:285a-18: des de nas de blangs te /
K06D0032_H0033:285a-19: de ltar byas nas lus sdug bsngal du 'bad pa byas pa dang /
K06D0032_H0033:285a-20: zhag bdun gyi nang du snyoms par 'jug pa brgyad po rnams dang /
K06D0032_H0033:285a-21: mngon par shes pa lnga skyes te /
K06D0032_H0033:285b-0: btab dang bskrun pa'i 'bru @285b rnams ni //
K06D0032_H0033:285b-1: lhag ma med par spangs pa dang //
K06D0032_H0033:285b-2: yon tan du ma dang ldan pa'i //
K06D0032_H0033:285b-4: der ni dka' thub kyi gnas dang //
K06D0032_H0033:285b-5: sdod dang 'chag pa'i gnas rnams su //
K06D0032_H0033:285b-6: zhag bdun gyi ni nang nyid du //
K06D0032_H0033:285b-7: mngon par shes pa'i stobs thob bo //
K06D0032_H0033:285b-8: de ltar mngon par shes pa thob nas /
K06D0032_H0033:285b-9: blo gros bzang lo dka' thub pas bde ba'i snyoms par 'jug pa la gnas so //
K06D0032_H0033:285b-10: de'i tshe mar me mdzad ces bya ba'i ston pa 'jig rten du byon par gyur to //
K06D0032_H0033:285b-11: de mngal du zhugs nas bltams pa dang /
K06D0032_H0033:285b-13: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba na /
K06D0032_H0033:285b-14: 'jig rten gyi khams stong phrag bcu po thams cad g-yos so //
K06D0032_H0033:285b-18: sngon gyi mtshan mar byur pa sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /
K06D0032_H0033:285b-19: blo gros bzang po dka' thub pas snyoms par 'jug
K06D0032_H0033:285b-20: pa'i bde ba la gnas pas de rnams kyi sgra
K06D0032_H0033:285b-22: de rnams kyi sngon gyi mtshan ma ma mthong ngo //
K06D0032_H0033:285b-24: stan gcig la ni rten nas su //
K06D0032_H0033:285b-25: bdag gis de ltar grub pa thob //
K06D0032_H0033:285b-26: rgyal ba mar me mdzad ces pa //
K06D0032_H0033:285b-28: mngal du zhugs nas skyes gyur pa //
K06D0032_H0033:285b-29: sangs rgyas nas ni chos bstan pa //
K06D0032_H0033:285b-30: mtshan ma bzhi po mthong ma gyur //
K06D0032_H0033:285b-31: bsam gtan bde bsam thos so //
K06D0032_H0033:286a-1: ldan pa'i mar me mdzad zag pa zad pa 'bum
K06D0032_H0033:286a-2: phrag bzhi'i 'khor dang bcas pa go rims bzhin du
K06D0032_H0033:286a-3: sems can la phan pa'i phyir 'chag cing dga' ba
K06D0032_H0033:286a-4: can zhes bya ba'i grong khyer du byon te /
K06D0032_H0033:286a-5: blta na sdug ces bya ba'i gtsug lag khang chen por zhugs so //
K06D0032_H0033:286a-6: dga' ba can zhes bya ba'i grong khyer na gnas
K06D0032_H0033:286a-7: pa'i mar me mdzad dge sbyong gi dbang phyug de
K06D0032_H0033:286a-8: nyid yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi mchog
K06D0032_H0033:286a-9: thob nas mchig gi chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ro
K06D0032_H0033:286a-10: // de ltar rim gyis sems can la phan pa'i
K06D0032_H0033:286a-11: don du 'chag cing dga' ba can gyi grong khyer
K06D0032_H0033:286a-12: // du byon te / blta na sdug gi gtsug
K06D0032_H0033:286a-13: lag khang chen por bzhugs pa de de na gnas
K06D0032_H0033:286a-14: pa rnams kyis thos nas mar gsar dang /
K06D0032_H0033:286a-15: zhun mar la sogs pas dang /
K06D0032_H0033:286a-18: mal cha la sogs pa dang /
K06D0032_H0033:286a-19: dri'i phreng ba la sogs pa lag tu thogs te /
K06D0032_H0033:286a-23: de rnams la 'dud cing de la dga' ba dang /
K06D0032_H0033:286a-24: de la shin tu gus pa dang bcas pas ston pa'i drung du song ste /
K06D0032_H0033:286a-25: phyag byas nas dri la sogs pa'i mchod pa byas te /
K06D0032_H0033:286a-26: phyogs gcig tu 'khod cing chos bstan pa mnyan nas
K06D0032_H0033:286b-0: sang mgron du @286b gnyer te rang gi gnas nas
K06D0032_H0033:286b-1: song ngo // de rnams byas nas sang sbyin pa chen po sta gon byas te /
K06D0032_H0033:286b-3: stobs bcu la byon pa'i mam brgyan te chu yis
K06D0032_H0033:286b-4: sa gzhi mi mnyam pa'i gnas rnams sus blugs nas
K06D0032_H0033:286b-5: sa gzhi mnyam par byas so //
K06D0032_H0033:286b-6: dngul gye mdog lta bu'i byems spras so //
K06D0032_H0033:286b-7: me tog gi phreng ba nyid dang /
K06D0032_H0033:286b-8: me tog gi sil ma dgram par byas so //
K06D0032_H0033:286b-9: kha dog sna tshogs pa'i gos kyi rgyal mtshan dang /
K06D0032_H0033:286b-10: bden la sogs pa bsgreng bar byas so //
K06D0032_H0033:286b-12: bum pa gang ba rnams sgrigs nas bzhag par byas so //
K06D0032_H0033:286b-13: de'i tshe blo gros bzang po dka' thub pas rang
K06D0032_H0033:286b-14: gi gnas nas steng du 'phags te mi de rnams
K06D0032_H0033:286b-15: kyi steng gi cha'i mkha' la 'gro ba de la
K06D0032_H0033:286b-16: mi rnams dga' zhing tshim pas mthing ste nam mkha'
K06D0032_H0033:286b-17: nas sa la phyogs gcig tu 'khod pa la mi
K06D0032_H0033:286b-19: bsod nams dang ldan pa rnams lam 'di rnams su zhig gis brkyen par byas /
K06D0032_H0033:286b-21: yul dang phyogs kyi mthar gnas pa'i //
K06D0032_H0033:286b-22: de bzhin gshegs pa mgron du gnyer //
K06D0032_H0033:286b-23: de nyid byin nas lam 'di ni //
K06D0032_H0033:286b-24: sems ni dga' bas lam phyogs gcig /
K06D0032_H0033:286b-25: bdag ni de tshe de yi dus //
K06D0032_H0033:286b-26: rang gi gnas ni byed pa dang //
K06D0032_H0033:286b-27: shing shun gos ni rlung gis g-yo //
K06D0032_H0033:287a-2: dga' dang tshim dang bde ba yis //
K06D0032_H0033:287a-3: skye bo lam 'phyag byed pa mthong //
K06D0032_H0033:287a-4: nam mkha' las ni byon nas su //
K06D0032_H0033:287a-5: de ma thag par mi la 'dri //
K06D0032_H0033:287a-6: dga' 'ang tshim la bde ba yi //
K06D0032_H0033:287a-7: mkhas shing rig pa'i skye bo che //
K06D0032_H0033:287a-8: lam ni snyoms par byed lan //
K06D0032_H0033:287a-10: mi rnams kyis smras pa; btsun pa dka' thub pa blo gros bzang po nyid kyis mi mkhyen nam /
K06D0032_H0033:287a-11: stobs bcu dang ldan pa'i mar me mdzad kyis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thob nas /
K06D0032_H0033:287a-13: sems can rnams la phan pa'i don du 'chag cing /
K06D0032_H0033:287a-14: bdag cag gi grong khyer du byon nas blta na
K06D0032_H0033:287a-15: sdug gi gtsug lag khang chen por bzhugs la bdag
K06D0032_H0033:287a-16: cag gis bcom ldan 'das de mgron du gnyer to
K06D0032_H0033:287a-17: // de'i phyir sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de byon pa'i lam brgyan par bya'o //
K06D0032_H0033:287a-18: dka' thub pa blo gros bzang pos bsams pa /
K06D0032_H0033:287a-19: sangs rgyas zhes bya ba'i sgra tsam yang 'jig rten du rnyed par dka'o //
K06D0032_H0033:287a-20: de ltar sangs rgyas byon pa la bdag mi 'di
K06D0032_H0033:287a-21: rnams dang bcas pas stobs bcu pa'i lam brgyan par
K06D0032_H0033:287a-23: des mi rnams la gsungs pa /
K06D0032_H0033:287b-0: gal te khyod rnams kyis lam 'di rnams @287b sangs rgyas kyi ched du brgyan par gyis shig /
K06D0032_H0033:287b-1: bdag la'ang gnas gcig sbyin bar gyis shig /
K06D0032_H0033:287b-2: bdag gis kyang khyed rnams dang 'grogs nas lam brgyan par bya'o //
K06D0032_H0033:287b-3: de rnams kyis legs so zhes bsams nas /
K06D0032_H0033:287b-4: dka' thub pa blo gros bzang pos rdzu 'phrul dang
K06D0032_H0033:287b-5: ldan par shes nas chu yis gnod par byas pa'i
K06D0032_H0033:287b-6: gnas phan tshun du bsams nas de la gnas brgyan
K06D0032_H0033:287b-7: par gyis shig ces byin no //
K06D0032_H0033:287b-8: blo gros bzang po sangs rgyas la dga' nas bsams so //
K06D0032_H0033:287b-9: bdag gis gnas 'dir rdzu 'phrul gyis brgyan par nus so //
K06D0032_H0033:287b-10: ji ltar brgyan par byas kyang bdag gi yid tshim par med do //
K06D0032_H0033:287b-11: bdag gis de ring lus dub par byas so //
K06D0032_H0033:287b-12: sa rnams blangs nas gnas der blug go /
K06D0032_H0033:287b-13: de de yis phyogs de brgyan pa ma grub par
K06D0032_H0033:287b-14: stobs bcu dang ldan pa'i mar me mdzad thub pa
K06D0032_H0033:287b-15: chen po dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang
K06D0032_H0033:287b-16: ldan pa zag pa zad pa 'bum phrag bzhi'i 'khor
K06D0032_H0033:287b-17: dang bcas pa rnams la lha rnams kyis lha'i dri
K06D0032_H0033:287b-18: chen po dang / bzang dang / me tog gi
K06D0032_H0033:287b-19: phreng ba la sogs pas mchod par byed cing lha'i
K06D0032_H0033:287b-20: glu dbyangs dang bcas pa sgrogs so //
K06D0032_H0033:287b-21: mi rnams kyis mi'i dri bzang dang /
K06D0032_H0033:287b-22: me tog gi phreng ba la sogs pas mchod par
K06D0032_H0033:287b-23: byed cing mtha' yas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rol ba'i
K06D0032_H0033:287b-24: rim no shi la'i steng du seng ge sgra sgrogs
K06D0032_H0033:288a-1: de'i lam brgyan par byas nas lam du byon /
K06D0032_H0033:288a-2: blo gros bzang po dka' thub pas mig gis bltas
K06D0032_H0033:288a-3: nas lam brgyan pa la stobs bcu pa byon no
K06D0032_H0033:288a-4: // skyes bu chen po'i mtshan bzang po sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan pa /
K06D0032_H0033:288a-5: dbe byad bzang po brgyad cus nye bar gsal ba /
K06D0032_H0033:288a-6: 'od 'dom gang gis yongs su bskor ba dang /
K06D0032_H0033:288a-7: nor bu'i kha dog lta bu nam mkha'i mthil la
K06D0032_H0033:288a-8: sna tshogs pa'i rnam pa glog gi 'od lta bu
K06D0032_H0033:288a-9: dus dang / dus ma yin par 'byung ba nyid zung dang /
K06D0032_H0033:288a-11: kha dog drug dang ldan pa'i tshogs sangs rgyas kyi
K06D0032_H0033:288a-12: 'od zer 'phro zhing gzugs mchog thob pa'i bdag nyid
K06D0032_H0033:288a-13: bltas nas de ring bdag gis stobs bcu pa la
K06D0032_H0033:288a-14: srog yongs su gtong bar rigs so //
K06D0032_H0033:288a-16: 'jim ba'i steng du 'gro bar mi rigs so //
K06D0032_H0033:288a-17: nor bu'i spang leb kyi ?zam pa la zhabs gnon
K06D0032_H0033:288a-18: cing gshegs pa lta bur zag pa zad pa 'bum
K06D0032_H0033:288a-19: phrag bzhi dang lhan cig bdag gi rgyab gnon cing
K06D0032_H0033:288a-20: gshegs su gsol // de ni bdag la yun ring por phan pa dang /
K06D0032_H0033:288a-21: bde bar 'gyur ro; ;skra bkrol te gzig gi pags pa dang /
K06D0032_H0033:288a-23: 'jim pa nag po'i steng nor bu'i spang leb kyi
K06D0032_H0033:288a-24: zam pa lta bu'i 'jim ba'i steng du nyal lo
K06D0032_H0033:288b-1: bdag gis de la dri lung bstan //
K06D0032_H0033:288b-3: rgyal ba mar me mdzad ces pa //
K06D0032_H0033:288b-5: mi mnyam lam ni 'chos pa dang //
K06D0032_H0033:288b-6: de yi lam ni byi dor byed //
K06D0032_H0033:288b-7: sangs rgyas zhes pa bdag gis thos //
K06D0032_H0033:288b-8: de ma thag tu dga' ba skyes //
K06D0032_H0033:288b-9: sangs rgyas sangs rgyas zhes brjod pa //
K06D0032_H0033:288b-10: yid bde dga' ba skyes par gyur //
K06D0032_H0033:288b-11: tshim zhing dga' ba skyes pa'i sems //
K06D0032_H0033:288b-12: de ru 'khor te rnam par bsam //
K06D0032_H0033:288b-13: 'dir ni sa bon bskrun byas nas //
K06D0032_H0033:288b-14: de ma thag tu bdag la skye; ;gal te sangs rgyas ched byi dor //
K06D0032_H0033:288b-15: ma bcos gnas gcig bdag la byin //
K06D0032_H0033:288b-16: bdag kyang byi dor byed pa yin //
K06D0032_H0033:288b-18: de tshe lam ni byi dor byar //
K06D0032_H0033:288b-19: bdag la ma bcos gnas gcig byin //
K06D0032_H0033:288b-20: sangs rgyas sangs rgyas zhes bsam zhing //
K06D0032_H0033:288b-22: bdag gi gnas ni ma grub par //
K06D0032_H0033:288b-23: thub pa chen po mar me mdzad //
K06D0032_H0033:288b-24: mngon shes drug po mtshungs ldan par //
K06D0032_H0033:288b-25: 'bum phrag bzhi po rnams la ni //
K06D0032_H0033:288b-26: dri ma med cing zag pa zad //
K06D0032_H0033:288b-27: rgyal ba lam du byon par gyur //
K06D0032_H0033:288b-28: bsu ba byed pa po rnams ni //
K06D0032_H0033:288b-29: rol mo rnams ni dkrol ba dang //
K06D0032_H0033:288b-30: lha dang mi rnams yi rang byed //
K06D0032_H0033:288b-31: legs so zhes pa'i tshig byin no //
K06D0032_H0033:288b-32: lha yis mi rnams mthong ba dang //
K06D0032_H0033:289a-1: rnams kyis kyang lha rnams mthong //
K06D0032_H0033:289a-2: de gnyis kyi ni thal mo sbyor //
K06D0032_H0033:289a-3: de bzhin gshegs dang thabs gcig 'gro /
K06D0032_H0033:289a-4: lha dang lha yi rol mo dang //
K06D0032_H0033:289a-5: mi dang mi yi rol mo dang //
K06D0032_H0033:289a-6: gnyis ka yang ni rol mo dkrol //
K06D0032_H0033:289a-7: de bzhin gshegs dang thabs gcig 'gro /
K06D0032_H0033:289a-8: lha mi me tog man d'a ra //
K06D0032_H0033:289a-9: padma pa ri tshad tra ka /
K06D0032_H0033:289a-10: phyogs dang mtshams su me tog 'thor //
K06D0032_H0033:289a-11: lha rnams mkha' la gnas nas so //
K06D0032_H0033:289a-12: tsam pa kam sh'a la lam ni pam//
K06D0032_H0033:289a-13: n'a g'a punn'a g'a ke ta kam/
K06D0032_H0033:289a-14: stong gis phyogs dang mtshams su 'thor //
K06D0032_H0033:289a-15: sa steng 'gro ba mi rnams so //
K06D0032_H0033:289a-16: der ni bdag gi skra bkrol nas //
K06D0032_H0033:289a-17: shing shun chos gos gzig lpags ni //
K06D0032_H0033:289a-18: 'jim ba'i steng du bting nas ni //
K06D0032_H0033:289a-19: kha bub tu ni bdag gis nyal //
K06D0032_H0033:289a-20: 'jim pa'i steng nas mi gshegs par //
K06D0032_H0033:289a-21: bdag ni gnon cing sangs rgyas rnams //
K06D0032_H0033:289a-22: slob ma 'khor bcas gshegs su gsol //
K06D0032_H0033:289a-23: bdag la phan par 'gyur ba yin //
K06D0032_H0033:289a-24: de 'jim pa'i steng du nyal nas slar yang mig
K06D0032_H0033:289a-25: gis blta zhing stobs bcu dang ldan pa'i mar me
K06D0032_H0033:289a-26: mdzad sangs rgyas kyi 'byor pa yang dag par bltas
K06D0032_H0033:289a-28: gal te bdag gis nyon mongs pa thams cad gzhom par 'dod pa dang /
K06D0032_H0033:289a-29: dge 'dun rnams kyi gzhon nur 'gyur bar bya ba dang /
K06D0032_H0033:289b-0: dga' @289b ba can gyi grong khyer du 'jug par 'dod do //

K06D0032_H0033:310a-5: rgya mtsho la sogs pa'i phyogs lhag ma rnams dang /
K06D0032_H0033:310a-6: tshang bang la sogs pa gser gyis spras pa bzhin no; ;sku tshe'i tshad ni stong phrag dgu bcu'o //
K06D0032_H0033:310a-7: de rnams kyi dus la zla ba dang /
K06D0032_H0033:310a-8: nyi ma la sogs pa la rang gi 'od kyi snang ba'i nus pa med do //
K06D0032_H0033:310a-10: nyin mo'i bye brag mi shes so //
K06D0032_H0033:310a-11: sems can rnams kyi nyin mo nyi ma shar ba
K06D0032_H0033:310a-12: bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi 'od kyis rtag tu 'gro
K06D0032_H0033:310a-13: bar byed do // mtshan mo me tog zum pa dang /
K06D0032_H0033:310a-14: snga dro'i dus su bya rnams skad 'byin pa la
K06D0032_H0033:310a-15: sogs pa la brten nas 'jig rten pas nyin mtshan
K06D0032_H0033:310a-17: yang dag par rdzogs ba'i sangs rgyas gzhan rnams la ci'i phyir 'di lta bu med pa yin nam /
K06D0032_H0033:310a-18: med pa ni ma yin te /
K06D0032_H0033:310a-19: de rnams kyis kyang dgongs par gyur na /
K06D0032_H0033:310a-20: stong phrag bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams su gyur pa'am /
K06D0032_H0033:310a-21: de bas lhag par yang 'od 'phro bar byed do //
K06D0032_H0033:310a-22: slar yang bcom ldan 'das bkra shis bzang po sngar gyi don du gnyer ba'i dbang gis te /
K06D0032_H0033:310a-23: gzhan gyi 'od 'dom gang pa bzhin no //
K06D0032_H0033:310a-24: sku'i 'od kyis rgyun mi 'chad pa nyid du stong
K06D0032_H0033:310a-25: phrag bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams khyab par byas nas
K06D0032_H0033:310b-0: gnas so // de'i byang chub sems dpa'i @310b spyod
K06D0032_H0033:310b-1: pa'i dus na thams cad sgrol bzhin du bdag nyid
K06D0032_H0033:310b-2: gnas so // gnas so // de'i bu dang /
K06D0032_H0033:310b-3: bu mor bcas pa ri bo bham ga bzhin du ri la bzhugs so //
K06D0032_H0033:310b-4: de nas mche ba gcig pa gdug pa can gyi
K06D0032_H0033:310b-5: gnod sbyin zhig gis skyes bu chen po sbyin pa
K06D0032_H0033:310b-6: gtong zhes thos nas bram ze'i gzugs kyis nye bar
K06D0032_H0033:310b-7: song ste sems dpa' chen po'i drung du bu mo
K06D0032_H0033:310b-8: slong ngo // sems dpa' chen pos bram ze la bu dang /
K06D0032_H0033:310b-9: bu mo sbyin no zhes bsams nas dga' ba dang /
K06D0032_H0033:310b-10: tshim pas chu'i mthar thug pa'i sa rnams g-yos so //
K06D0032_H0033:310b-11: de nas gnod sbyin 'chag pa'i gnas kyi mthar tsog
K06D0032_H0033:310b-12: pur rgyab rten la 'dug ste sems dpa' chen po
K06D0032_H0033:310b-16: des la phug za ba bzhin du bu dang /
K06D0032_H0033:310b-17: bu mo zos nas gnod sbyin gyis skyes bu chen po de la blta ste /
K06D0032_H0033:310b-18: kha gdangs nas me 'bar ba bzhin du khrag gi rgyun 'bab bo //
K06D0032_H0033:310b-19: de'i kha mthong nas kyang skra'i rtse mo tsam gyi
K06D0032_H0033:310b-20: yid mi bde ba yang ma skyes par ngas byin
K06D0032_H0033:310b-21: pa shin tu legs pa gcig go zhes sems so
K06D0032_H0033:310b-22: // slar yang lus la mchog tu dga' ba chen po skyes so //
K06D0032_H0033:310b-23: de dag 'di la byin pa'i bsod nams kyi phan
K06D0032_H0033:310b-24: yon gyis ma 'ongs pa na 'di lta bu'i rim
K06D0032_H0033:310b-25: pa'i 'od zer 'phro bar don du gnyer ro //
K06D0032_H0033:311a-0: de la don du gnyer ba'i rgyu mtshan gyis sangs rgyas @311a *//
K06D0032_H0033:311a-1: su gyur nas sku'i 'od de phyi rol tu 'phro zhing de rnams la khyab par gnas so //
K06D0032_H0033:311a-3: 'di'i sngar gyi mdzad pa yod pas de byang chub
K06D0032_H0033:311a-4: sems dpa'i dus su sangs rgyas gcig gi sku gdung
K06D0032_H0033:311a-5: gi mchod rten mthong nas sangs rgyas 'di'i sku gdung
K06D0032_H0033:311a-6: la bdag gis 'tsho ba yongs su gtang na rigs
K06D0032_H0033:311a-7: so snyam nas shing ras kyis dkris pa bzhin du
K06D0032_H0033:311a-8: lus thams cad gos gzhan gyis dkris shing rin po
K06D0032_H0033:311a-9: che'i cod ban gyon nas 'bum phrag gcig ri ba'i
K06D0032_H0033:311a-10: gser gyi snod du mar gyis bkang ste dar ras
K06D0032_H0033:311a-11: 'de stong phrag brgya btsugs nas mar me sbar te
K06D0032_H0033:311a-12: / mgo'i steng du bzhag cing lus thams cad kyang
K06D0032_H0033:311a-13: 'bar bar byas nas sku gdung gi mchod rten la
K06D0032_H0033:311a-15: de ltar mtshan thog thag snga dro'i skya rengs shar
K06D0032_H0033:311a-16: gyi bar du 'bad pa byed pa nyid kyis ba
K06D0032_H0033:311a-17: spu'i khung bu tsam dro bar ma gyur te /
K06D0032_H0033:311a-18: padma'i tshal du bzhugs pa bzhin no //
K06D0032_H0033:311a-19: chos zhes bya ba 'di rang nyid bsrung na chos bsrungs par 'gyur ro //
K06D0032_H0033:311a-21: chos bzhin bsrung na chos spyod do //
K06D0032_H0033:311a-22: chos kyis bsgral na chos bzhin thob //
K06D0032_H0033:311a-23: legs par bsgral na chos phan yon //
K06D0032_H0033:311b-0: 'di'i las kyi 'bras bu @311b bcom ldan 'das de
K06D0032_H0033:311b-1: sku'i 'od kyis stong phrag bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams
K06D0032_H0033:311b-3: de'i tshe bdag cag ni byang chub sems dpa' shin
K06D0032_H0033:311b-4: tu sred ba zhes bya ba'i bram zer gyur to
K06D0032_H0033:311b-5: // des ston pa mgron du gnyer ba'i phyir drung
K06D0032_H0033:311b-6: du song ste chos snyan pa'i bshad ba thos nas
K06D0032_H0033:311b-8: sang bdag gi gdugs tshod la byon pa zhu zhes so //
K06D0032_H0033:311b-9: bram zer dge slong du tsam dgos zhes gsungs pa dang /
K06D0032_H0033:311b-10: btsun ba 'khor dang bcas pa'i dge 'dun du tsam bdog ces zhus so //
K06D0032_H0033:311b-11: de'i tshe ston pa'i 'dus pa dang po nyid tsam yod do //
K06D0032_H0033:311b-12: de'i phyir bye ba stong phrag brgya yod ces gsungs pa dang /
K06D0032_H0033:311b-13: btsun pa 'khor thams cad dang bcas pa bdag gi
K06D0032_H0033:311b-14: khang par gdugs tshod la byon par zhu zhes zhus
K06D0032_H0033:311b-15: pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang ste bram zes sang don du gnyer cig /
K06D0032_H0033:311b-17: bdag gis dge slong 'di rnams la thug pa dang /
K06D0032_H0033:311b-19: gos la sogs pa 'bul bar nus so //
K06D0032_H0033:311b-20: bzhugs pa'i gnas ji lta bu zhes bsams so //
K06D0032_H0033:311b-21: dpag tshad brgyad khri bzhi stong gi steng na gnas
K06D0032_H0033:311b-22: pa'i lha'i rgyal po'i lva ba dmar po'i rdo leb
K06D0032_H0033:311b-23: la bzhugs pa na dro bar gyur te /
K06D0032_H0033:312a-0: brgya byin gang zhig bdag gi gnas 'dir 'dod ba'i sems su zhig la yod snyam pa @312a *//
K06D0032_H0033:312a-2: lha'i dbang pos lha'i mig gis bltas pas skyes bu chen po de mthong nas /
K06D0032_H0033:312a-3: 'di ltar shin tu sred pa'i bram ze sangs rgyas
K06D0032_H0033:312a-4: la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun mgron du
K06D0032_H0033:312a-5: gnyer te / bzhugs pa'i gnas kyang bsams kyi /
K06D0032_H0033:312a-6: bdag kyang der phyin nas bsod nams kyi cha len
K06D0032_H0033:312a-7: par rigs so snyam nas shing mkhan gyi gzugs su
K06D0032_H0033:312a-9: dgra sta blangs te skyes bu chen po'i mdun du gnas par gyur nas /
K06D0032_H0033:312a-10: gang su zhig kho bo la gla byin te las ka byed pa yod ces smras so //
K06D0032_H0033:312a-11: skyes bu chen pos gzigs te /
K06D0032_H0033:312a-12: gang zhig las ka byed nus zhes gsungs pa dang /
K06D0032_H0033:312a-13: bdag gis mi shes ba'i bzo med do //
K06D0032_H0033:312a-15: gang zhig cung zad byed pa'i bzo de bdag gis byed kyang nus so zhes zer ro //
K06D0032_H0033:312a-16: byang chub sems dpas smras pa /
K06D0032_H0033:312a-17: de'i phyir nga la las su bya ba yod de /
K06D0032_H0033:312a-18: kho bos sang 'phags pa las bye ba phrag brgya
K06D0032_H0033:312a-19: pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun mgron du gnyer to
K06D0032_H0033:312a-20: // de rnams bzhugs pa'i gnas byed par nus sam /
K06D0032_H0033:312a-23: bdag la gla ster nus sam /
K06D0032_H0033:312a-25: legs so zhes bya ba legs par byas so //
K06D0032_H0033:312b-0: phyin nas sa phyogs gcig @312b bltas nas dpag tshad bcu gnyis sam /
K06D0032_H0033:312b-1: bcu gsum pa'i tshad kyi sa phyogs gcig tu zad
K06D0032_H0033:312b-2: bar sngon po'i dkyil 'khor bzhin du steng mnyam par
K06D0032_H0033:312b-3: byas so // des 'di rnams kyi gnas tsam du
K06D0032_H0033:312b-4: rin po che sna bdun las byung ba'i bsti gnas
K06D0032_H0033:312b-5: sa 'og nas phyung nas bya'o zhes bsam zhing blta'o
K06D0032_H0033:312b-6: byas so // // de ma thag par sa gzhi brtol nas bsti gnas grub bo //
K06D0032_H0033:312b-7: de ni gser las byung ba'i ka ba rnams la
K06D0032_H0033:312b-8: dngul las byung ba'i ka gzhu'i steng du gser las
K06D0032_H0033:312b-10: nor bu'i ka ba la byi ru'i rang bzhin no;
K06D0032_H0033:312b-11: ;byu ru'i ka pa la nor bu'i rang bzhin no
K06D0032_H0033:312b-12: // rin po che sna bdun las byung ba'i ka
K06D0032_H0033:312b-13: ba la rin po che sna bdun las byung ba'i
K06D0032_H0033:312b-15: de nas bsti gnas kyi bar bar du g-yer kha'i
K06D0032_H0033:312b-16: dra ba 'phyang ba la blta zhing de bltas tsam
K06D0032_H0033:312b-18: gang la rlung gis bskyod pa de la yan lag
K06D0032_H0033:312b-19: lnga pa'i rol mo sgra snyan sgrogs te lha'i glu
K06D0032_H0033:312b-21: bar bar du spos kyi phreng ba dang /
K06D0032_H0033:312b-22: me tog gi phreng ba 'phyang ba la sems zhing phreng ba 'phyang ba la'o //
K06D0032_H0033:312b-23: bye ba stong phrag brgya'i dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi grangs kyis stan dang /
K06D0032_H0033:312b-24: rgyab rten rnams sa gzhi la brtol nas byung bar bsams so //
K06D0032_H0033:312b-25: de ma thag tu sa'i steng du grub bo //
K06D0032_H0033:313a-1: rnams su re rer chu'i snod chen po grub pa bsams so //
K06D0032_H0033:313a-2: chu'i snod chen bo de rnams grub bo //
K06D0032_H0033:313a-3: de dag thams cad sprul nas bram ze'i drung du song nas /
K06D0032_H0033:313a-4: 'phags pa 'dir byon la bsti gnas gzigs mdzod /
K06D0032_H0033:313a-5: bdag la gla sbyin par rigs so zhes zhus nas /
K06D0032_H0033:313a-6: skyes bu chen po gshegs te bsti gnas gzigs nas
K06D0032_H0033:313a-7: de ma thag tu brgya byin mi snang bar gyur
K06D0032_H0033:313a-8: to // gzigs pa tsam na lus thams cad kha
K06D0032_H0033:313a-9: dog lnga dang ldan pa la dga' ba rgyun mi
K06D0032_H0033:313a-11: de nas bsti gnas gzigs nas 'di ltar yid la bsams so //
K06D0032_H0033:313a-12: bsti gnas 'di mir gyur pas bsgrubs pa ma yin no //
K06D0032_H0033:313a-13: slar yang bdag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa dang /
K06D0032_H0033:313a-14: bdag gi yon tan rtogs pas nges par brgya byin
K06D0032_H0033:313a-15: gyi stan dro bar gyur nas brgya byin lha'i dbang
K06D0032_H0033:313a-16: pos bsti gnas 'di byas par gyur to //
K06D0032_H0033:313a-17: de nas slar yang 'di lta bu'i tshul gyi bsti
K06D0032_H0033:313a-18: gnas su nyi ma gcig nyid la sbyin pa gtong
K06D0032_H0033:313a-19: ba ni bdag gi rigs pa ma yin no //
K06D0032_H0033:313a-20: nyi ma bdun du bdag gis ster bar bsams so //
K06D0032_H0033:313a-21: phyi rol gyi sbyin pas ji tsam gyis kyang byang chub sems dpa' rnams dgyes par mi nus so //
K06D0032_H0033:313b-0: rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i @313b mgo bo bcad ba dang /
K06D0032_H0033:313b-1: dri ma med pa'i mig gtong ba dang /
K06D0032_H0033:313b-3: bcad nas byin pa'i dus su byang chub sems dpa' btang ba'i dgyes par 'gyur ro //
K06D0032_H0033:313b-4: bdag cag byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yang sha
K06D0032_H0033:313b-5: si bi'i skyes rabs las nyi ma re rer dong
K06D0032_H0033:313b-6: tse khal lnga lnga ri ba'i rin gyis nyos nas
K06D0032_H0033:313b-7: sgo bzhi dang / grong khyer gyi dbus su sbyin pa gtong ngo //
K06D0032_H0033:313b-8: de'i sbyin pa de gtong bas yongs su tshim pa med do //
K06D0032_H0033:313b-9: slar yang gang gi tshe brgya byin lha yi rgyal
K06D0032_H0033:313b-10: po bram ze'i gzugs kyis 'ongs nas mig slangs so
K06D0032_H0033:313b-11: // de'i tshe de'i mig bton nas ster ba nyid kyis dgyes par 'gyur ro //
K06D0032_H0033:313b-12: skra'i rtse mo tsam yang sems la sdug bsngal bar mi 'gyur ro //
K06D0032_H0033:313b-13: de bzhin du sbyin pa'i rgyus byang chub sems dpa' la tshim pa med do //
K06D0032_H0033:313b-14: de'i phyir skyes bu chen po de yang zhag bdun
K06D0032_H0033:313b-15: bdag gis bye ba stong phrag brgya'i grangs kyis dge
K06D0032_H0033:313b-16: slong gi dge 'dun rnams la sbyin pa gtong bar
K06D0032_H0033:313b-18: de'i bsti gnas su bzhugs nas zhag bdun du dga'
K06D0032_H0033:313b-19: ba p'a na zhes bya ba'i sbyin pa byin no
K06D0032_H0033:313b-20: // dga' ba can zhes pa ni ches che ba'i
K06D0032_H0033:313b-21: snod shin tu che ba 'o mas bkang nas tshad
K06D0032_H0033:313b-22: dbang chen po'i steng du bzhag nas mes 'o ma
K06D0032_H0033:313b-23: shin tu bska bar bskol te 'bras cung zad btab
K06D0032_H0033:314a-1: gsar pa rnams btsos pa'i bza' ba'i 'o thug ni dga' ba b'a na zhes brjod do //
K06D0032_H0033:314a-2: mi rnams kyis 'dren par ma nus na lha rnams kyis kyang bar bar du 'dren no //
K06D0032_H0033:314a-4: bcu gsum pa'i tshad kyi gnas su dge slong rnams ma shong na /
K06D0032_H0033:314a-5: slar yang dge slong de rnams rang rang gi mthus
K06D0032_H0033:314a-6: bzhugs so; ;zhag bdun gyi mthar dge slong thams cad
K06D0032_H0033:314a-7: kyi lhung bzed bkrus nas sman gyi phyir du mar
K06D0032_H0033:314a-8: gsar pa dang / zhun mar dang /
K06D0032_H0033:314a-10: bu ram bskol ba'i chu rnams kyis lhung bzed bkang nas chos gos gsum dang bcas pa phul lo //
K06D0032_H0033:314a-11: dge 'dun gzhon nu rnams kyis dge slong gis thob
K06D0032_H0033:314a-12: pa'i chos gos kyi rgyu'i ras 'bum phrag gcig ri
K06D0032_H0033:314a-14: ston pas rjes su yi rang ba mdzad do //
K06D0032_H0033:314a-15: skyes bu 'dis 'di lta bu'i tshul gyis sbyin pa chen po byin no //
K06D0032_H0033:314a-16: gang gi don du 'gyur zhes rtog par byed do //
K06D0032_H0033:314a-17: ma 'ongs pa'i bskal pa 'bum phrag gcig lhag pa'i
K06D0032_H0033:314a-18: grangs med pa gnyis 'das pa na goo ta ma
K06D0032_H0033:314a-19: zhes bya ba'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur zhes gzigs te
K06D0032_H0033:314a-20: / skyes bu chen po bos nas khyod kyi dus
K06D0032_H0033:314a-21: 'di rnams 'das nas goo ta ma zhes bya ba'i
K06D0032_H0033:314a-22: sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan no //
K06D0032_H0033:314b-0: skyes bu chen pos lung bstan pa thos @314b nas bdag ni sangs rgyas su 'gyur bas /
K06D0032_H0033:314b-1: bdag khyim na gnas pa la don med kyi rab tu 'byung ngo snyam du bsams so //
K06D0032_H0033:314b-2: de de lta bu'i tshul dang ldan pas mchil ma
K06D0032_H0033:314b-3: dor ba bzhin du khyim spangs nas ston pa'i drung
K06D0032_H0033:314b-4: du rab tu byung zhing byung nas sangs rgyas kyi
K06D0032_H0033:314b-5: gsung rab bslabs nas mngon par shes pa dang /
K06D0032_H0033:314b-7: tshe'i mthar tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skyes so //
K06D0032_H0033:314b-9: bcom ldan 'das bkra shis bzang po'i grong khyer mchog ces bya bar gyur to //
K06D0032_H0033:314b-10: yab ni mchog gi rgyal po'o //
K06D0032_H0033:314b-11: yum ni mchog ma zhes bya ba'o //
K06D0032_H0033:314b-13: chos kyi sde gnyis ni nyan thos kyi mchog go /
K06D0032_H0033:314b-14: bskyang ba zhes bya ba ni nye gnas so //
K06D0032_H0033:314b-16: mya ngan med gnyis ni nyan thos ma'i mchog go /
K06D0032_H0033:314b-17: byang chub shing ni klu shing ngo //
K06D0032_H0033:314b-18: sku'i mtho tshad du khru brgyad cu rtsa brgyad pa'o //
K06D0032_H0033:314b-19: stong phrag dgu bcu'i lo ni sku tshe'i tshad do //
K06D0032_H0033:314b-20: stong phrag dgu bcu bzhugs nas mya ngan las 'das so //
K06D0032_H0033:314b-21: sangs rgyas mya ngan las 'das nas slar yang de
K06D0032_H0033:314b-22: ma thag par stong phrag bcu'i khor yug gi phyogs
K06D0032_H0033:314b-24: khor yug thams cad kyi mi rnams cho nges chen po 'debs so //
K06D0032_H0033:314b-27: 'jig rten nang gi mun bsal nas //
K06D0032_H0033:315a-2: de bzhin du stong phrag bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams
K06D0032_H0033:315a-3: mun nag tu byas nas mya ngan las 'das so
K06D0032_H0033:315a-4: // bcom ldan 'das de'i 'og gi char yid bzang zhes bya ba'i ston pa byon no //
K06D0032_H0033:315a-5: de yi yang nyan thos kyi 'dus pa gsum ste /
K06D0032_H0033:315a-6: 'dus pa dang po la bye ba stong phrag brgya'i dge slong ngo //
K06D0032_H0033:315a-7: 'dus ba gnyis pa la gser gyi ri la bye ba stong phrag dgu bcu'o //
K06D0032_H0033:315a-8: gsum pa la bye ba stong phrag brgyad cu'o //
K06D0032_H0033:315a-9: de'i tshe sems dpa' chen po klu'i rgyal po mnyam med ces bya bar gyur te /
K06D0032_H0033:315a-10: rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu dang ldan zhing des sangs rgyas
K06D0032_H0033:315a-11: byon pa thos nas gnyen gyi grogs rnams 'khor du
K06D0032_H0033:315a-12: byas te / klu'i gnas nas 'thon te /
K06D0032_H0033:315a-13: bye ba stong phrag brgya'i dge slong gi 'khor dang
K06D0032_H0033:315a-14: bcas pa'i bcom ldan 'das la lha'i rol mos nye
K06D0032_H0033:315a-15: bar mchod nas sbyin pa chen po phul lo //
K06D0032_H0033:315a-16: so so la lha'i gos gnyis gnyis phul pas skyabs su 'gro ba'i tshul khrims la gnas so //
K06D0032_H0033:315a-17: de yang ston pa des ma 'ongs pa na sangs rgyas su 'gyur bar lung bstan no //
K06D0032_H0033:315a-18: bcom ldan 'das de'i grong khyer dge ba can zhes bya bar gyur to //
K06D0032_H0033:315a-19: legs byin zhes bya ba'i rgyal po ni yab bo //
K06D0032_H0033:315a-20: dpal ldan ma zhes bya ba ni yum mo //
K06D0032_H0033:315b-0: goms byed ni @315b nyan thos kyi mchog go /
K06D0032_H0033:315b-3: nye bar nyan pa gnyis ni nyan thos ma'i mchog go /
K06D0032_H0033:315b-4: byang chub kyi shing ni klu shing ngo //

K06D0032_H0033:343a-0: @343a *// gal te rgyal por gyur na rgyal rigs kyi gzhon

K06D0032_H0033:383b-9: me tog gi phreng ba dang /
K06D0032_H0033:383b-10: spos la sogs pa la chags ba med ba skyes so //

K06D0032_H0033:386b-19: grang dang dro bas mi nyams shing //
K06D0032_H0033:386b-20: de ltar ri dvags la sogs pa'i //
K06D0032_H0033:386b-21: sdig sbrul dang ni sbrang bu dang //
K06D0032_H0033:386b-22: ba mo dang ni char pas so //
K06D0032_H0033:386b-23: de ltar rlung dang shin tu dro //
K06D0032_H0033:386b-24: so sor lus la gos pa dang //
K06D0032_H0033:386b-25: khang nang gnas nas bde ba skyes //
K06D0032_H0033:386b-26: khang bar bsam gtan lhag mthong rnams //
K06D0032_H0033:386b-28: sangs rgyas mchog gis bsngags par mdzad //
K06D0032_H0033:386b-29: skyes bu mkhas pas de yi phyir //
K06D0032_H0033:386b-30: bdag nyid kyi ni phyir du ni //
K06D0032_H0033:387a-1: bas gtsug lag khang byed pa //
K06D0032_H0033:387a-2: mang du thos pa gnas pa yin //
K06D0032_H0033:387a-3: de rnams kyi ni bza' dang btung //
K06D0032_H0033:387a-4: gos dang mal cha stan dang ni //
K06D0032_H0033:387a-5: de rnams sems ni drang bos dbul //
K06D0032_H0033:387a-6: rab tu dang ba'i sems gyis so //
K06D0032_H0033:387a-7: des ni de la chos bstan to //
K06D0032_H0033:387a-8: sdug bsngal thams cad nyer zhi'i phyir //
K06D0032_H0033:387a-9: gang de'i chos ni rtogs pa dang //
K06D0032_H0033:387a-10: rten med mya ngan 'das par byed //
K06D0032_H0033:387a-11: ces bya ba'i gtsug lag khang gi phan yon bshad do //
K06D0032_H0033:387a-12: mgon med zas sbyin gyis nyi ma gnyis pa nas
K06D0032_H0033:387a-13: bzung nas sbyin pa gtong ba'i mgo brtsams so; ;sa
K06D0032_H0033:387a-14: khams byas pa'i khang bzang ni zla ba bzhis grub
K06D0032_H0033:387a-15: bo // slar yang mgon med zas sbyin gyi gtsug lag khang chen po zla ba dgus grub bo //
K06D0032_H0033:387a-16: gtsug lag khang chen po la yang bye ba stong phrag bco brgyad nyid song ngo //
K06D0032_H0033:387a-17: 'di la gtsug lag khang chen po 'di nyid la
K06D0032_H0033:387a-18: bye ba phrag lnga bcu rtsa bzhi'i nor yongs su
K06D0032_H0033:387a-19: btang ngo // slar yang 'das pa'i bcom ldan 'das
K06D0032_H0033:387a-20: rnam par gzigs kyi dus su tshong dpon kun gyi
K06D0032_H0033:387a-21: grogs zhes bya bas gser gyi glang bo'i rkang ba'i
K06D0032_H0033:387a-22: rmig rjes lta bu'i sa gzhi nyos nas /
K06D0032_H0033:387a-23: gnas 'di nyid du dpag tshad gcig gi dge 'dun gyi kun dga' rab byas so //
K06D0032_H0033:387a-24: bcom ldan 'das gtsug tor can gyi dus su /
K06D0032_H0033:387a-25: dpal 'phel zhes bya ba'i tshong dpon gyi bsu gser
K06D0032_H0033:387b-0: gyi sder ma rgyun mi 'chad pas nyos @387b ba'i
K06D0032_H0033:387b-1: sa gzhi'i gnas de nyid du rgyang grags bcu gnyis
K06D0032_H0033:387b-2: kyi tshad tsam gyi dge 'dun gyi kun dga' rab
K06D0032_H0033:387b-3: byas so // bcom ldan 'das thams cad skyob kyi
K06D0032_H0033:387b-4: dus su tshong dpon bkra shis zhes bya bas gser
K06D0032_H0033:387b-5: gyis gzhi gser gyi rkang pa'i rjes lta bu'i sa
K06D0032_H0033:387b-6: gzhi nyos nas gnas de nyid du dpag tshad phyed
K06D0032_H0033:387b-7: kyi dge 'dun gyi kun dga' rab byas so //
K06D0032_H0033:387b-8: bcom ldan 'das log par dad sel gyi dus su
K06D0032_H0033:387b-9: tshong dpon 'pho ba med pa zhes bya bas gser
K06D0032_H0033:387b-10: gyi pha gu lta bu rgyun mi 'chad pa'i sa
K06D0032_H0033:387b-11: gzhi nyos nas gnas de nyid du rgyang grags bzhi'i
K06D0032_H0033:387b-12: tshad kyi dge 'dun gyi kun dga' ra ba byas
K06D0032_H0033:387b-13: so // bcom ldan 'das gser thub kyi dus su
K06D0032_H0033:387b-14: tshong dpon drag po zhes bya bas gser gyi rus
K06D0032_H0033:387b-15: sbal rgyun mi 'chad pa lta bu'i sa gzhi nyos
K06D0032_H0033:387b-16: nas gnas de nyid du rgyang grags gnyis kyi tshad
K06D0032_H0033:387b-17: kyi kun dga' ra ba byas so //
K06D0032_H0033:387b-18: bcom ldan 'das 'od srung gi dus su tshong dpon
K06D0032_H0033:387b-19: bkra shis bzang po zhes bya bas gser gyi pha
K06D0032_H0033:387b-20: gu rgyun mi 'chad pa lta bus sa gzhi nyos
K06D0032_H0033:387b-21: nas gnas de nyid du rgyang grags gcig gi tshad
K06D0032_H0033:387b-22: kyi kun dga' rab byas so //
K06D0032_H0033:387b-23: slar yang bdag cag gi bcom ldan 'das kyi dus
K06D0032_H0033:387b-24: su tshong dpon mgon med zas sbyin gyis bye ba
K06D0032_H0033:387b-25: phrag bco brgyad kyi dbyig gis gser gyi 'dra men
K06D0032_H0033:387b-26: du byas pa rgyun mi 'chad pa lta bus sa
K06D0032_H0033:387b-27: gzhi nyos nas gnas de nyid du rgyang grags byed
K06D0032_H0033:387b-28: kyi kun dga' rab byas so //
K06D0032_H0033:388a-1: rgyas thams cad kyis ma spangs pa'i gnas yin no //
K06D0032_H0033:388a-2: 'di ltar byang chub chen po'i snying po'i drung du
K06D0032_H0033:388a-3: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob pa ji srid
K06D0032_H0033:388a-4: pa nas yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i mthar
K06D0032_H0033:388a-5: thug pa de srid du gang dang gang gi gnas
K06D0032_H0033:388a-6: su bcom ldan 'das bdag bzhugs pa 'di ni nye
K06D0032_H0033:388a-7: ba'i gleng gzhi zhes bya ba'o //
K06D0032_H0033:388a-8: de'i lus kyis skyes rabs thams cad du bsngags par mdzad de /
K06D0032_H0033:388a-9: skyes ba rabs kyi gleng gzhi'i bshad pa rdzogs so ////
K06D0032_H0033:388a-10: pandi ta a'a nanda shr'i'i zhal snga nas dang /
K06D0032_H0033:388a-11: mang du thos pa'i lo tstsha ba sh'a kya'i dge slong nyi ma rgyal mtshan dpal bzang pos /
K06D0032_H0033:388a-12: skad gnyis smra ba rnams kyi gdan sa gtsug lag
K06D0032_H0033:388a-13: khang chen po dpal thar pa gling du bsgyur cing
K06D0032_H0033:388a-14: zhus te gtan la phab pa'o //
